body: OK I admit that I should've done some research before posting something that is not entirely true, now here is the correct information: Main company: MediaBank Co Ltd. Label: Queen Bee. So this is a work of QB, it's a label under the bigger 'umbrella' MB. Other labels under MB: White Bear, Hot Bear, GOLD BEAR. Source: https://www.anisearch.com/company/953,mediabank-co-ltd
Came here after watching the anime , honestly queen bee ruined another good doujin
Animation (Studio: MediaBank, under Producer: Queen Bee): https://hanime.tv/videos/hentai/otaku-ni-yasashii-gal-toka-kyonyuu-no-osananajimi-toka-1

Only good part of it is the Otaku/Gyaru part. The rest is repetitive FUB rape and incest you've seen 500 time before. An artist who pumps out generically bad copy paste ntr plots goes with queen bee who will give him fast money? Not surprising at all. Besides, bunnywalker is who pumps out the most dogshit hentai nowdays.
Another masterpiece that would be fucking ruined by a powerpoint presentation studio... fuckin "F" man...
